impactOfQrenciaSection.heading: Impact created by Qrencia
impactOfQrenciaSection.description: Qrencia brought a revolution in skill development ecosystem through skill competitions

cards.heading: Silver Medal - WorldSkills Kazan Russia 2019
cards.description: Qrencia helped team India create history at WorldSkills International Competition. Pranav Nutalapati,a 16-year-old young boy from Bangalore was mentored by Ms. Ruchi Pareek.
